DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy safety ATV/r either 200/100 mg 300/100mg give daily Thai patient combination 2NRTIs .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Atazanavir/r Versus Standard Dose Atazanavir/r ( LASA )
DOC.detailed_description: To demonstrate non-inferiority treatment atazanavir/ritonavir ( ATV/r ) 200/100 mg daily ( OD ) compare control group ( ATV/r 300/100 mg OD ) regard proportion virologic responder ( plasma HIV RNA < 200 copies/mL ) 48 week ARV-experienced HIV-1 infected subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . HIV infect adult age equal 18 year 2 . Received ritonavir boost PIbased HAART > 3 month prior screen visit 3 . History HIV RNA < 50 copies/ml within 12 month prior screen visit 4 . HIVRNA < 50 copies/ml screen visit 5 . Signed write informed consent 1 . Active AIDSdefining disease active opportunistic infection 2 . History virological failure ( plasma HIVRNA ≥1,000 copies/ml ) use ritonavir boost PIbased HAART 3 . Pregnancy lactation screen visit 4 . Relevant history current condition illness might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion e.g . chronic diarrhea , malabsorption 5 . Use concomitant medication may interfere pharmacokinetics study drug e.g . rifampicin , proton pump inhibitor 6 . History sensitivity/idiosyncrasy drug chemically related compound may employ study 7 . ALT ≥200 IU/L screen visit 8 . Creatinine clearance < 60 c.c . per min CockroftGault formula screen visit
DOC.keyword: efficacy safety lower dose atazanavir/ritonavir suppress HIV-infected adult
